name: S.T.P.W Cosmic Prism
description:
*NARRATIVE*

You play as a weak little creature who's only defense is a little Droid. You can however control the Color of your base!

Match your color to the enemy attacking you and your Droid will kill for you!

This game was made for Ludum Dare 37 and it's made by me(David Styrbjörn) and by Theihe. You can find Theihe's other games by following this link http://www.indiexpo.net/en/search?utf8=%E2%9C%93&s...

*CONTROLS*

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

E - Press buttons

P or Escape- Pause

M - Mute
